tweet: Market Outlook #47 is live:  https://t.co/cHMJADPW88  In this post, I cover the chop in $BTC, as well as the current consolidation in $ETH and $XMR; plus I provide an update on $LTC and take a look at whether $TUBE has found a bottom.  Enjoy the read, and please share!

In the future @HavenProtocol_ will be able to make Monero upgrades within hours instead of weeks!  Thanks to a new and more efficient rebase, which is currently running on testnet.   This rebase will also include:  - All security fixes from Monero - Ledger Support (in Q3)
